name: CGDisplayChangeSummaryFlags
desc: The configuration parameters that are passed to a display reconfiguration callback function.

items.name: static var beginConfigurationFlag: CGDisplayChangeSummaryFlags
items.desc: The display configuration is about to change.

items.name: static var movedFlag: CGDisplayChangeSummaryFlags
items.desc: The location of the upper-left corner of the display in the global display coordinate space has changed.

items.name: static var setMainFlag: CGDisplayChangeSummaryFlags
items.desc: The display is now the main display.

items.name: static var addFlag: CGDisplayChangeSummaryFlags
items.desc: The display has been added to the active display list.

items.name: static var removeFlag: CGDisplayChangeSummaryFlags
items.desc: The display has been removed from the active display list.

items.name: static var mirrorFlag: CGDisplayChangeSummaryFlags
items.desc: The display is now mirroring another display.

items.name: static var unMirrorFlag: CGDisplayChangeSummaryFlags
items.desc: The display is no longer mirroring another display.
